events.name: Delivering complex technology implementations with NoSQL and Cloud
events.description: Using lessons from the Healthcare.gov Insurance Marketplace, Mr. Henry Chao will discuss how to incorporate complex, changing requirements, continuously manage risks and choose technology solutions appropriate to the problem. While working for the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services in the US, Mr. Henry Chao led the design and implementation of a secure and efficient healthcare insurance marketplace under the Affordable Care Act – which you probably know of as Obamacare. In a highly politicized environment, he delivered one of the world’s most challenging data projects, bringing all different formats of data together, from a multitude of systems across a number of government departments. And then in this instance, using this information to provide healthcare services to citizens. Speaker – Mr. Henry Chao has over 20 years of experience leading national scale implementations of complex healthcare programs for the US Federal government. As Chief Technology Officer for the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services, he established technical standards and reference architectures to create greater efficiency, agility, and responsiveness to key healthcare business challenges while under extreme schedule constraints. As CMS’ Deputy Chief Information Office, Mr. Henry Chao led the design and implementation of a secure and efficient data hub solution supporting Federal and State agencies’ objectives in establishing a first ever online, real-time user experience for consumers shopping for health plans in the Insurance Marketplaces under the Affordable Care Act. A recognized and trusted leader, Mr. Henry Chao has forged strategic relationships and formed coalitions with government and commercial organizations across the healthcare ecosystem to achieve common policy and business objectives. Presently Mr. Henry Chao is supporting a wide range of clients in the Health Information Technology sector as a Strategic Consultant and Solutions Architect. NoSQL Demo - Seeing is Believing! Learn how you can ingest, search, discover, harmonize, enrich and operationalize your data silos in minutes! Demonstration of NoSQL technology by MarkLogic Thank you and looking forward to having you all there.
events.location: Zion Global Marketing , 24 Raffles Place, Clifford Centre, #10-06, Seminar Room 1, Singapore

events.name: Talk Data To Me
events.description:
RSVP for free here: ga.co/2qf9Hkj

Speakers:
Elena Zadnepranets (Senior Data Analyst, Carat Asia Pacific)
Chi-Loong Chan (‎Founder, VslashR)
Saif Farooqui (Analytics Lead - Business Integrity, Facebook)

Moderator: Jia Qing Yap

Overview: At this event, we host thought-leaders from the Singapore data community to discuss the possibilities that data brings to life. They’ll cover how today’s wealth of data drives business and product decisions across industries ranging from journalism to programming, and share their visions for the future.
What You’ll Take Away: Learn how you can leverage data in your role — no matter the industry. Our expert panel will cover real-world scenarios in which data has driven business success, discuss how data can be a powerful weapon for problem-solving, and share their insights on exciting career opportunities in data.

Why It Matters: According to a Forbes article, “2017 will be the year big data goes mainstream … whether gathering data on the front end or making big decisions in the C-Suite, every single person in your organization must buy into the value [data] analytics brings”.
Data is everywhere, and it affects not only how we run our businesses, but how we live as individuals. Understanding the ways you can leverage data in your personal and professional life can help you find key insights, make smarter decisions, and elevate your career.

Agenda:
Check-in 6:45 - 7:15 pm
Panel/Lightning Talks 7:15 - 8:30 pm
Q&A and Networking 8:30 - 9:00 pm
